text:
@GovernorPataki @NYGovCuomo @nypost Phony Governor of NY Cuomo who thinks he’s a movie star, has blood on his hands.
He’s responsible for 1000s of deaths in our nursing homes, because he forced them to accept COVID-19 positive patients while ship Confort and converted Javits Ctr. with 1000s of beds were empty.
